meanings.definition: A person who engages in dishonest and fraudulent business dealings.
meanings.sent1: The racketeers were caught selling fake products to unsuspecting customers.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the racketeers involved in the illegal gambling operation.
meanings.sent3: The racketeers tried to trick people into buying worthless items.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood was plagued by racketeers preying on small businesses.
meanings.sent5: The image of the racketeers cheating hardworking individuals stuck in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: To engage in dishonest and fraudulent business activities.
meanings.sent1: Some individuals racketeer by selling counterfeit goods online.
meanings.sent2: The criminals racketeered by extorting money from local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to racketeer by scamming people out of their savings.
meanings.sent4: He felt like he was racketeering his way through the competitive market.
meanings.sent5: The company was accused of racketeering to gain an unfair advantage over its rivals.
